text:
NARW diet consists primarily late-stage juveniles adults 
copepods genera Calanus Pseudocalanus (Nemoto 1970; Cummings
1985; Kenney et al. 1985; Mayo Marx 1990; Beardsley et al. 1996;
Mayo et al. 2001; Baumgartner et al. 2003, 2007; Pendleton et al. 2009;
Meyer-Gutbrod et al. 2015). NARWs also known occasionally feed 
smaller copepods, krill, pteropods, planktonic larval
stages barnacles crustaceans (Kenney 2018).
